name: Crossroad of Worlds: Magic stars Collector's Edition
name_original: Crossroad of Worlds: Magic stars Collector's Edition
description:
This game consists of the best mini-games and item search scenes by DominiGames! Are you familiar with Dreyer Crowley, the Guardian of Magical Worlds? Did you know then that the skies above are not just glistening bubbles full of gas and cosmic dust – their light protects whole universes from oblivion and subjugation? Only imagine a life in the depths of the night with no memories of your own – someone’s stealing them all. What if there was no place left where the stars remained? Now look up through your window and see if the stars are in place across your vast skies…? You have to go on a fascinating journey in which you have to explore fairy-tale worlds, collect all the stars to bring memories to the inhabitants of worlds, as well as solve many interesting puzzles! Gather your wits for an unforgettable detective story in this pulse-pounded new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

🔍 Solve the case!
Quests await! Finish the main game to access a bonus chapter and visit a real Magic Bar!

🔍 Earn stars!
Find the differences and get stars! At each stage of the game you need to earn stars to advance to the next level and complete the investigation

🔍 Enjoy the quest!
Challenge yourself to find all the items! Show your focus and reaction as you explore the locations and collect hidden items to complete all the interactive games. Show off your skills and save worlds.
